name: humantest
description: Test Harness and GUI app for manual asset verification

scripts.test: npm run gen-npm && cd npm && npm i && npm test
scripts.clean: rm -fr ./build && cd ThunderBolt; npm run clean
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cd ThunderBolt; npm run build
scripts.dev-start: here=`pwd`; npm run build && cd ThunderBolt/electronMain; npm run package && cd $here; npm run start
scripts.dev-build: here=`pwd`; npm run build && cd ThunderBolt/electronMain; npm run package && cd $here; inchjs
scripts.gen-npm: npm run dev-build && tsccd ./build && npm run x-gen-npm
scripts.x-gen-npm: cd npm && rm -fr example ht-app index.js ExchangeCommon.js ExchangeFlow.js.map ExchangeCommon.js.map; ln -s ../ThunderBolt/electronMain/release-builds ht-app && ln -s ../build/ExchangeFlow.js index.js && ln -s ../build/ExchangeCommon.js ExchangeCommon.js && ln -s ../build/ExchangeFlow.js.map && ln -s ../build/ExchangeCommon.js.map && ln -s ../example example && documentation readme index.js --section=API
scripts.publish: npm run gen-npm && rm -fr publish-temp; mkdir publish-temp; cd publish-temp; cp -r ../npm .; cd npm && rm -fr ./ht-app &&  npm publish .
scripts.make-tgz: cd publish-temp; rm -fr ht.app ht.app.tgz;  cp -r ../npm/ht-app . && tar czf ht-app.tgz ht-app && echo "Don't forget to release a new ht-app.tgz on GitHub"

author: tremho
